attributes.action: Make the councils introduce a new fairer housing register,especially to people who have been waiting for years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why is there a housing register? when some people can have their name on one and still be waiting for years!i have been waiting for 15 years or so but they would rather pay my high rent in private rented property knowing i will never be able to afford it myself,and according to them its unlikely ill ever be offererd affordable social housing,,,HELLO so why am i on the housing list??????????.
